name: Amazing Sơn Trà
description:
Son Tra
peninsula or Monkey mountain is the barrier to the north east protecting Danang
from the coming storms. This is also known as the natural reserve which is the
habitat of more than 100 species of fauna, including 8 rare animals like the
red-shanked doucs and  nearly 289 plant species, including 64 large tree
species and 107 medicinal and ornamental plants. It is an ideal place for
sightseeing, tourism, convalescence and cultural activities.
